features.featureTitle: Update the site footer to indicate Vertex Media is active on TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook by replacing the existing social links/icons with TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook links/icons, and (optionally) adding a short line of text that reads naturally with the existing tone (e.g., “Active on TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook.”).

Update the Contact page “Connect With Us” section to match the updated social platforms (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook) so the site’s social presence is consistent across relevant sections without changing any other Contact page copy, form fields, or layout structure.
